azureClient.authority: Insert the URI of the Azure authorization provider here.
azureClient.clientId: Insert the ID of the client - that requires authorization - here.
azureClient.clientSecret: Insert the secret - known to that client - here.
azureClient.scope: Insert the scopes - the client is requesting access to - here.

auth0Client.authority: Insert the URI of the Auth0 authorization provider here.
auth0Client.clientId: Insert the ID of the client - that requires authorization - here.
auth0Client.clientSecret: Insert the secret - known to that client - here.
auth0Client.audience: Insert the audience - the client is claiming to be part of - here.
